content: hannah s handmade designs bow follow me on all my socials here linktr ee/hhdesigns4 copyright 2022 of hannah s handmade designs all rights reserved you are not allowed to sell this pattern you are not allowed to distribute or publish this pattern in any form you are not allowed to alter this pattern in any form to sell as your own items made from this pattern may be sold by individuals with the exception that you give credit to hannah s handmade designs link above mass produced quantities of this item are prohibited supplies abbreviations us terms magic_ring- magic_ring make single_crochet into -any yarn with adjustable loop ch2 method can suggested hook also be used size on yarn chain- chain st- stitch label single_crochet- single_crochet approx 10-20yds half_double_crochet- half_double_crochet -scissors double_crochet-double_crochet esa- each stitch around -needle slip_stitch- slip_stitch rnds- rounds increase- increase 2sc in same st notes decrease- decrease crochet two stitches 1 chain 1 at the together using the decrease beginning of the method 3sc increase x6- repeat the pattern row does not within the parentheses 6 times count as a st f/o- fasten_off *note that not all terms are used within this pattern if you have any questions please feel free to message m e through my facebook and instagram pages listed on 1st page or you can email me hhdesigns4@gmail com bow 1 chain 11 half_double_crochet into 2nd chain from hook 9hdc 10 2-6 chain 1 turn 10hdc 10 f/o leave long yarn tail steps please see image on next page 1 what your piece should look like after making 2 take needle and long tail and weave to approximately the center do this with the other tail too 3 what your piece should look like after step 2 4&5 fan fold the piece to look like this the center and both ends at top and bottom should be in front 6 take the long piece of yarn and start wrapping it around the center of the piece until secure take both tails and tie them in a knot thank you and enjoy
